North_Little_Rock.Zeb Ward Building: The Zeb Ward Building is a historic commercial building located at 1001-1003 West Markham Street in Little Rock, Arkansas. It is a two-story masonry structure, with cast iron storefront surrounds and otherwise brick construction. The building has vernacular commercial Italianate style, with narrow windows at the upper level set in segmented-arch and round-arch openings with brick headers.
